snippet: While thousands of Eritrean migrants attempt the journey to Europe each month, an Eritrean journalist in Paris asks them to stay home and make a difference.
lead_paragraph: While thousands of Eritrean migrants attempt the journey to Europe each month, an Eritrean journalist in Paris asks them to stay home and make a difference.

headline.print_headline: Horrors of Eritrea Met With a Shrug
headline.main: Horrors of Eritrea Met With a Shrug

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
